Um, Yan...scince when are you the sole ruler of the RPG? Last time i checked 
we had a Council that decided on these matters. And I do post damage for my 
charaters. You have to admit that this case, or little stunt, was way over 
the line. 

--part1_78.104cc41a.27b4807e_boundary
